title: Caught on Camera: Elephant blocks road to enjoy sugar cane from passing trucks (Video)Caught on Camera are real life moments from armed robberies to near death experiences that will shock you and leave you terrified.
short_description: Caught on Camera finds the most fascinating real-life moments caught on camera. CCTV cameras are often associated with catching criminals and preventing theft, they have also captured some hilarious moments, weird moments, and sometimes terrifying moments.

title: JUST IN: Nine killed in minibus taxi and long-distance bus collisionA total of nine people have been killed after a minibus taxi and long-distance bus were involved in a collision, update to follow.
short_description: A total of nine people have been killed after a minibus taxi and long-distance bus were involved in a collision in the Eastern Cape this afternoon, Sunday, 4 June.

title: Lifehack: How to tie a tie! Super fast and easy (VIDEO)Life just became a lot easier with the LIFEHACK series from The South African website. A new life hack every day of the week – don’t miss it!
short_description: Life just became a lot easier with the lifehack series from The South African website. A new lifehack every day of the week – don’t miss it!

title: Two burnt bodies recovered in Joburg shack fireTwo burnt bodies were recovered this morning, Sunday, 4 June, following a destructive shack fire in the wee hours.
short_description: Two burnt bodies were recovered this morning, Sunday, 4 June, following a destructive shack fire in Joburg’s Zandspruit informal settlement.

title: REPORT: Springbok says NAY to R15 million offer from SA side, YAY to R22 million deal in AsiaMoney talks: Big name player turns down big local offer for even bigger foreign offer.
short_description: One of the most prominent current Springbok players has reportedly turned down a mega-million offer from the Stormers in favour of an even more lucrative deal with a Japanese club.

title: Cholera Outbreak: Death toll rises to 26The waterbourne disease is spread by drinking water or eating food that is infected with the bacteria.-Health Department
short_description: The department of health has confirmed that the death toll related to the cholera outbreak has risen to 26, with almost 140 active cases.

title: South Africa’s ‘Van Ryns’ named best wine brandy in the worldSouth African produced Van Ryns 15-year-old postil brandy has been named the Worlds best Wine Brandy in 2023.
short_description: 15-year-old Stellenbosch-produced potstill brandy has been named the best wine brandy in the world.

title: Police make breakthroughs in AKA murder casePolice have reportedly made important breakthroughs in the investigation into the murder of Kiernan Forbes, also known as AKA.
short_description: Police have reportedly made important breakthroughs in the investigation into the murder of Kiernan Forbes, also known as AKA.

title: City of Johannesburg intensifies cholera-monitoring amid outbreak The City of Johannesburg is conducting monthly sampling at strategically selected points within rivers, streams and dams to test for cholera.
short_description: The Member of the Mayoral Committee for Environment and Infrastructure Services in the City of Johannesburg, Cllr Jack Sekwaila, has reaffirmed the City’s commitment to conduct comprehensive cholera monitoring within river catchments.

title: Load shedding for the WEEK: Here’s the UPDATED scheduleEskom said load shedding will be implemented this WEEK. Here is your UPDATED schedule for the load shedding.
short_description: Eskom said load shedding would be implemented this WEEK. Here is your updated schedule.

title: Report: The use of vapes among school teenagers is worryingA worrying report has revealed that school teenagers are using vapes during school hours, parents also encouraging such acts.
short_description: The use of vapes has rapidly risen over the past few years especially among school teenagers in South Africa.

title: Northern Cape police on a high after R1million weed bustCrime stats released earlier this week, revealed that between January and March, drug related crime in the country stands at 41 810.
short_description: Police in the Northern Cape have apprehended two suspects, after being found with a large bag of weed in a hiking spot. Weighing 47 kilograms, the estimated street value of the drug is estimated at R1,1million.

title: WATCH: Roads washed away, houses flooded in OverstrandCleanup operations are under way in the Overstrand District after heavy rains destroyed roads and left some residents temporarily displaced.
short_description: So far, the damage to homes, roads and other infrastructure in Pringle Bay and Betty’s Bay is estimated to be in excess of R25 million.

title: ‘Banks can refuse to reverse transactions despite request by client’Users are warned to be careful with their bank activities and binding legalities because banks do not have to reverse legal transactions.
short_description: The Ombud for banking services in South Africa says banks do not have to reverse transactions even if a client might launch a formal request for the reversal.

title: EFF want NMB city manager gone‘There will therefore be no peaceful council in the NMB until such a point that Noxolo Nqwazi is removed as the City Manager’-EFF
short_description: Just a week into the newly formed ANC-EFF lead coalition in Nelson Mandela Bay Metro. the Economic Freedom Fighters have called for the axing of City Manager Noxolo Nqwazi due to her involvement in a R24million toilet tender corruption case.

title: Penuel the Black Pen makes his Top 20 Best SA Hip-hop Tracks of All TimeMany are agreeing with Penuel’s BEST Top 20 SA Hip-hop tracks of all time, including his ‘unexpected’ number ONE track.
short_description: YouTuber and critical thinker Penuel the Black Pen has gone public with his Top 20 Best Hip-hop tracks of all time produced by South African artists.

title: Here are Africa’s representatives in Britain’s Got Talent finaleAfrica will be represented by South Africa and Uganda in the finale of Britain’s Got Talent on Sunday evening.
short_description: South African dancer, Musa Motha’s performance to Naughty Boy and Beyonce’s track ‘Runnin’ earned him a spot in history books as all the judges gave him the golden buzzer in Britain’s Got Talent.

title: From Ireland: Knocked Out SA boxer showing signs of progress in hospitalIt is reported that SA boxer Ludumo ‘9mm’ Lamati suffered a brain bleed during the 12th and final round. He left the ring in a stretcher.
short_description: Knocked-out SA boxer Ludumo ‘9mm’ Lamati is reportedly showing signs of positive progress after suffering a brutal defeat last week.

title: Woman allows husband to cheat then she ends the marriageThis could have been a sign of mutual understanding to some until a woman who allowed her husband cheat eventually left the marriage.
short_description: Unless you’re in a very secure open relationship/marriage, being cheated on will hurt no matter what people say.

title: WATCH: Kidnapped Mangosuthu University of Technology Lecturer found deadKidnapped Mangosuthu University of Technology (MUT)  lecturer Shan Dwarika was found dead. Watch the video of his kidnapping here.
short_description: Kidnapped Mangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) lecturer Shan Dwarika (62) was found dead on Saturday.

title: Phobia of the Day: ChronomentrophobiaA phobia is an anxiety disorder involving fear of a situation or object. Exposure to the source of the fear triggers an irrational response.
short_description: A phobia is an anxiety disorder involving excessive and persistent fear of a situation or object. Exposure to the source of the fear triggers an immediate anxiety response.

title: Pun of the Day – Sunday, 4 June 2023Puns are undeniably cheesy at times, but almost always lead to a good laugh – and South Africans could all do with more of that right now!
short_description: Puns are undeniably cheesy, but almost always lead to a good laugh – and South Africans could all do with more of that right now!

title: Weather live updates: Cold fronts expected TODAY, causing rainfall in these parts of SAHere’s a glance at what the weather forecast has in store for you today across the provinces in South Africa.
short_description: Here’s a live blog to help you stay up to date on the daily weather forecast and finally choose whether you should wear a tank top or carry an umbrella!

title: Load shedding LIVE updates:Here is the most recent load shedding schedule for SundayAll your Load Shedding daily updates, schedules and news from Eskom to ensure you are not left in the dark!
short_description: Get all your load shedding updates in one place to help you plan for the day ahead. Follow our regularly updated live blog to find out when it just might go dark in your neighborhood and when the power is set to return. Is there a permanent solution to load shedding? Find out here.
